channel.title: Personality Disorder Test
channel.description:
I found this test while browsing the web recently. Basicly, it's a test to see the chances of you having a personality disorder. Post your results! Mine:
Paranoid: High Schizoid: Moderate Schizotypal: High Antisocial: Moderate Borderline: Low Histrionic: Moderate Narcissistic: Moderate Avoidant: High Dependent: Moderate Obsessive-Compulsive: Moderate
[url]https://www.4degreez.com/misc/personality_disorder_test.mv[/url]
EDIT: Theres actually a big chance I'm schizotypal, because according to wikipedia [quote] Technically speaking, schizotypal PD is an "extended phenotype" that helps geneticists track the familial or genetic transmission of the genes that are implicated in schizophrenia [/quote] and my uncle had (he's dead) schizophrenia, so I might carry the gene.

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: kjhank
item.description:
Disorder | Rating
Paranoid: Low
Schizoid: High
Schizotypal: Very High
Antisocial: Low
Borderline: Low
Histrionic: Low
Narcissistic: Low
Avoidant: Very High
Dependent: Very High
Obsessive-Compulsive: High

I was surprised with my antisocial skills being low, but then I read “A common misconception is that antisocial personality disorder refers to people who have poor social skills. The opposite is often the case”.
Well, I am fucked.

Read full topic

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Pleanty of other disorders would include compulsive lying, that isn’t proof of psychopathy.

I understand that. I’m saying it’s one of MANY signs.

Read full topic

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
Winged One:

Or just for the simple compulsion to lie. Sociopathic and psychopathic people are compulsive liars. They will lie about anything, and not just to escape punishment or other adverse consequences associated with truth.

I don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: Winged_One

Or just for the simple compulsion to lie. Sociopathic and psychopathic people are compulsive liars. They will lie about anything, and not just to escape punishment or other adverse consequences associated with truth.

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Actually, this is the entire reason it’s so difficult to diagnose sociopaths and psychopaths, because they’ll lie. The only people who will show up as either are hypochondriacs.

There’s a method sometimes used to detect these people, by inserting certain questions… such as admitting “I have vomited in my life”, or had diarrhea. Things nobody could have escaped experiencing… should be answered truthfully, yes of course, but some sociopathic or compulsively lying people will try to deny them because it doesn’t seem like a good, healthy answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Personality Disorder Test
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Acristoff:

How can you people get such low scores?

You’re too agreeable. Pretty much every question is in the form “I have this particular trait of insanity. Y/N?”

For example, answer the following question:
“I like to walk outside. Y/N?”

You just said “yes”, because who would get upset about walking outside? Other people would answer “no” because walking outside, while cool with them, isn’t something they’d go out of their way to say they like.

Other people balance their answers out, so even if they like walking outside, it’s not their most favouritest thing in the world… so they say “no” to make it look more important when they answer “yes” to “Do you like mudkips?”

Read full topic
